Posts.Content: Right. Even though I became a part of this board just recently and didn't know Heidi or Moopy I'm sending my love and hugs to all you. This board has been a lifesaver for me. It's wonderful to be able to talk and have all the support and love from everyone here! Denise

Posts.Content: I am going for bone scan on Tuesday and Pet scan on Thursday. Just diagnosed in November---confused and scared. My Doctor has scheduled surgery for January.
